text: Lyotchiki () is a 1935 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuli Raizman.Летчики It stars Ivan Koval-Samborsky, Yevgenia Melnikova, and Aleksandr Chistyakov. ==Actors== * Ivan Koval-Samborsky as Student Commander Sergei Belyaev * Yevgenia Melnikova as Flight School Student Galya Bystrova * Aleksandr Chistyakov as Ivan Matveyevich Khrushchev * Boris Shchukin as Flight School Commander Nikolai Rogachyov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1935 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuli Raizman
title: Lyotchiki
